scripts.test:development: ENV=development docker compose up -d --build && ENV=development npx playwright test ./test/test.spec.js; docker compose down
scripts.test:staging: ENV=staging docker compose up -d --build && ENV=staging npx playwright test ./test/test.spec.js; docker compose down
scripts.test:production: ENV=production docker compose up -d --build && ENV=production npx playwright test ./test/test.spec.js; docker compose down
